page.title: 19Education
page.content: The schools of the area are of two different types,the primary sector and the secondary sector.The primary schools have their own catchment areas although one school being a Catholic school,while another is a Church of England school. Until very recently there was a school run by the nuns at the Convent.This school was solely for girls of the Catholic faith. The secondary school has a catchment area well outside the study area.All the schools follow abilingual policy whereby an equal amount of time is given to teaching through the medium of Welsh and English.
